title: Sonic Assembly
description:
Sonic Assembly is a modular audio processing toolkit built in C++. It features a node-based interface for constructing complex signal chains and real-time DSP effects.

Designed for sound designers and experimental musicians, it provides low-level access to audio buffer manipulation while maintaining a user-friendly visual graph.

title: Velosonics
description: Velosonics was a pilot project to apply Machine Learning to audio analysis of delivery bicycles in order to identify current and prospective maintenance issues.  The project was a collaboration between Sonic Assembly and MoveByBike Italy and was selected as 1 of 10 crossdisciplinary projects in Europe by CreativeFLIP, supported by the Goethe Institute and European Commission.

title: Open Audio Streaming Kit
description: Open-source kit for converting audio into HLS format and uploading to Blob Storage. Includes a simple MVC UI, EF Core sample setup, and ffmpeg processing to support streaming playback workflows. Ideal for media apps looking to implement streaming functionality.

title: Hyper Radio
description:
Hyper Radio is an experimental web-based radio station that procedurally generates audio landscapes. Leveraging the Web Audio API, it creates infinite, evolving soundscapes that react to user interaction. 

The project explores the intersection of code and music composition, allowing users to influence the generative parameters in real-time.
